column4: I have this UIF file here. How do I make it an ISO in ubuntu?
you have searched the forums, right?
I've searched and found useless crap. I should'nt have to use a program with wine or whatnot.

I shouldn't have to drive a small slow car to work.. but I have to =)... uif isn't one of the "common" image formats.. try this link and see what they are suggesting http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=482960
